channel.title: Need help with adding a command [PI]
channel.description: I'm trying to add a command to boost a skill from like 1 - 25 its [PI] as I said in title. if someone could help me that would be great or give me a link to a tut, I have looked every where. Thanks. (please don't flame me I'm new to coding :) )

item.title: Need help with adding a command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @shott shott
item.description:
@shott wrote:

OK thanks for the help man will post if I get errors
Im prity sure most were for something different tho my bad lol
that’s the compile errors I got, I can try to fix them. If i need your help ill pm you

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/594/compileerrord.png/

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with adding a command [PI]

item.title: Need help with adding a command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[code]
}

         if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("thieving")) {
				if (c.inWild())
				return;
			c.playerXP[17] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(25)+5;
			c.playerLevel[17] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(17);
        }[/code]

okay i ripped this from my source it’s a PI base, so add this in commands.java and if you get errors please post and i’ll help you fix it.

Read full topic

what do you mean boost a skill?? like do ::level 0 25?

say i type ::thieving it will make it go from 1 - 25 instantly
